name: 2022 the 5th International Conference on Service Robotics Technologies
content: Publication: After a careful reviewing process, accepted papers in ICSRT 2022 will be published by ICSRT 2022 Conference Proceedings, which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, which will be archived in ACM Digital Library, and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
